nodes.text: Living Force: From the Cradle to the Grave

Living Force: From the Cradle to the Grave is a short story for the Living Force campaign. It was written by August and Cynthia Hahn and was published on the Wizards of the Coast website on February 23, 2006. In the story, on a pretext of competing for a last piece of kaavo pie, three companions each related the death of a loved one.
